sourcesContent:
Checkout

Order Items
{{item.groceryItem.name}}
{{item.groceryItem.description}}
Qty: {{item.quantity}}
${{(item.groceryItem.price * item.quantity) | number:'1.2-2'}}
Delivery & Payment
Please select a delivery slot.
{{error}}
Order Summary
Subtotal: ${{(total - 5) | number:'1.2-2'}}
Delivery Fee: $5.00
Total: ${{total | number:'1.2-2'}}
Your payment information is secure and encrypted.
